mapper.select: SELECT alt_apr_id, alt_apr_start_date, alt_apr_end_date, alt_apr_content, alt_apr_state, emp_id, alt_apr_emp FROM ALTERNATE_APPROVER WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND alt_apr_emp = #{altAprEmp} ORDER BY alt_apr_id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE ALTERNATE_APPROVER SET alt_apr_state = CASE WHEN sysdate < alt_apr_start_date OR sysdate > alt_apr_end_date THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND alt_apr_emp = #{altAprEmp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALTERNATE_APPROVER( alt_apr_id, alt_apr_start_date, alt_apr_end_date, alt_apr_content, alt_apr_state, emp_id, alt_apr_emp ) VALUES ( alt_apr_seq.nextval, #{altAprStartDate}, #{altAprEndDate}, #{altAprContent}, #{altAprState}, #{empId}, #{altAprEmp} )
mapper.select: -- 내가 부여한 대리자를 조회 SELECT alt_apr_id, alt_apr_start_date, alt_apr_end_date, alt_apr_content, alt_apr_state, emp_id, alt_apr_emp FROM ALTERNATE_APPROVER WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND alt_apr_state = 1 ORDER BY alt_apr_id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
